data.title: The Tommy Boy Story, Vol. 1 by Various Artists
data.meta_description: Released in 2006, The Tommy Boy Story contains dance hits from Afrika Bambaataa, Planet Patrol, G.L.O.B.E. & Whiz Kid, The Jonzun Crew, Information Society & more.
data.meta_site_name: Tommy Boy Records | Legendary Hip Hop & Dance Label Since 1981
data.text:
